sentence.Network_en: The sufferer can experience frequent relapses.
This phobia can cause untold misery for the sufferer.
sentence.Network_cn: 这种恐惧能给患者造成极度的痛苦.

sentence.Network_en: He's been a lifelong sufferer from hay fever.

entry.def: A sufferer from an illness or some other bad condition is a person who is affected by the illness or condition.

example.ex: Frequently sufferers of this kind of allergy are also sufferers of asthma.
example.tran: 患有这种过敏症的人也经常会患有哮喘病。

means.word_mean: 1. a person suffering from an illness
2. one who suffers for the sake of principle

auth_sentence.content: I have been an asthma sufferer my entire life.
auth_sentence.res_content: I have been an asthma sufferer my entire life.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I have been an asthma sufferer my entire life.

auth_sentence.content: The sufferer's GP should be the first port of call.
auth_sentence.res_content: The sufferer's GP should be the first port of call.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The sufferer's GP should be the first port of call.

auth_sentence.content: Unlike your average sufferer I am way ahead of the curve.
auth_sentence.res_content: Unlike your average sufferer I am way ahead of the curve.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Unlike your average sufferer I am way ahead of the curve.

sentences.en: He rendered assistance to the sufferers.
We are sympathetic with the flood sufferers.
The drug improves the long-term outlook of migraine sufferers.
sentences.cn: 这种药使偏头痛患者的长远病况有所改善。

sentences.en: He’s been a lifelong sufferer from hay fever.
Many sufferers have been reclaimed from a dependence on alcohol.
sentences.cn: 许多嗜酒成癖的受害者已经被挽救过来。

sentences.en: Only other sufferers know what it is like to be afflicted with this disease.
sentences.cn: 只有其他得过这种病的人才知道得这种病的痛苦滋味。

sentences.en: Sufferers from Alzheimer’s disease can’t cope at home.
sentences.cn: 阿尔茨海默氏病的患者不能够在家中自理。

sentences.en: The sessions will enable you to discuss problems with fellow asthma sufferers.
sentences.cn: 这些环节让你和其他哮喘病患者一起讨论问题。

sentences.en: The use of fish oil to treat cancer has brought fresh hope to millions of sufferers.
sentences.cn: 用鱼油治疗癌症的方法给数百万的患者带来了新的希望。

sentences.en: The worst sufferers of the condition tend to live in highly polluted areas.
sentences.cn: 病情最严重的患者大都居住在重度污染区。

sentences.en: This phobia can cause untold misery for the sufferer.
sentences.cn: 这种恐惧能给患者造成极度的痛苦。

sentences.en: The drug improves the long-term outlook of migraine sufferers.
sentences.cn: 这种药使偏头痛患者的长远病况有所改善。
